sentences.sCn: 他们结队在埃及坐大篷车旅行。

sentences.sContent: The established religion of Egypt is Islam.
sentences.sContent_eng: The established religion of Egypt is Islam.
sentences.sCn: 埃及的国教是伊斯兰教。

sentences.sContent: Glazes had been used from ancient times in Egypt.
sentences.sContent_eng: Glazes had been used from ancient times in Egypt.
sentences.sCn: 埃及自古代起就使用釉料。

phrases.pCn: 下埃及（指尼罗河三角洲及开罗南郊）
